mutants.code:
import heapq

def max_surviving_microorganisms(N, microorganisms):
    microorganisms.sort()
    Q = []
    ans = s = sz = 1
    for t in microorganisms:
        s += t[0]
        heapq.heappush(Q, (t[1], t[0]))
        sz += 1
        while sz and sz * Q[0][0] < s:
            s -= Q[0][1]
            heapq.heappop(Q)
            sz -= 1
        if sz > ans:
            ans = sz
    return ans

import heapq

def max_surviving_microorganisms(N, microorganisms):

    Q = []
    ans = s = sz = -1
    for t in microorganisms:

        heapq.heappush(Q, (t[1], t[0]))
        sz += 1
        while sz and sz * Q[0][0] < s:
            s -= Q[0][1]
            heapq.heappop(Q)
            sz -= 1
        if sz > ans:
            ans = sz
    return ans
